title: How do i lane against Quinn, and why i hate Quinn.
body:
Hello everyone, i haven't posted a forum post in a long time, and i am sad that my this post will be letting off a little steam with the recently reworked champions, and new champions in general, and to riot, i say,

What on earth where you thinking when you did these things, granted, all these things seem balanced, on a professional level, The last time i checked, only about under 10% of people, who play league, are ranked in or higher than Platinum on all servers. But to the remaining 90% of people, who are in Gold, Silver and Bronze, most of these things seem Absurd.

For example, I was playing Mundo in top lane, against a Quinn, at first, I thought i could sustain and tank the early game poke, What a mistake that was, the second, she hits with her passive, around 300-500 of my health was gone, at lvl 2, 3 and 4. How many champions, can you tell me, can safely lane against and make even, or heck even beat a quinn, because Tanks seem out of the question, adc's is more or less universally accepted by most people i've met and talked to, and the websites i've gone to, and most mages are squishy fucks to begin with.

I guess mainly, i am making this thread, so people can tell me how the fucking lane against this menace.

And do keep in mind, I did write this right after a game, so i may be a tad salty, but still, around half my health in 1 hit at lvl 3 is kinda stupid.

replies.body: you know the only problem i have with quinn? when that little birdy bitch uses e and it knocks your champ around and your attack goes the other way
So i'm not the only one who succumbs to that bs :/

Long story short on counter,buy a ranged all-in champ
Kappa Lux,Kat?
kat... yeah quinn has her e

>I was playing Mundo in top lane, against a Quinn, at first, I thought i could sustain and tank the early game poke, What a mistake that was, the second, she hits with her passive, around 300-500 of my health was gone

I'm Mundo, i go into lane against bird lady, i don't think to farm with Q i fight bird lady, she hurt me.

The key to beating a squishy top laner is not taking a tank, as you need to sustain through early lane phase and buy items. If you get behind, your laner snowballs as you have no innate damage to present a threat to them, and no tank as tanks mostly rely on items, although there are some exceptions *cough* Poppy and garen *cough*.

Instead, the key is to take an equally squishy top lane champ! Champions like yasuo, akali, zed, fizz etc would all do very well against a Quinn. Yasuo has the windwall to block the bird, akali has her W to provide anti-auto attack mechanics and has a buttload of damage at level 6, zed just kills ADC's without hesitation, and fizz is a slippery little fish with a ton of damage.

Experiment in top lane. It's the lane with the single most diverse pool of champions available.
Thanks, i think i think i'll try some.

stalkers blade > quinn
